name: Answers Beginning With 'U' Multiple Choice Quiz | Alphabetics | 25 Questions

questions.text: Name the Irish male vocal and instrumental group that begins with the letter 'u' whose hits include 'Desire', 'With or Without You' and 'New Years Day'.
Name the 'Beehive State' in western America that begins with the letter 'u' in the Rocky Mountains?
Name the landlocked republic that begins with the letter 'u' in East Africa?
Name the range of mountains that begin with the letter 'u' in Russia marking the boundary between Europe and Asia.
Name any persistent sore on the skin that begins with the letter 'u' caused by infection, chemical irritation or mechanical pressure?
Name the international religious movement that begins with the letter 'u' founded in South Korea in 1954 by Sun Myung Moon whose adherents are known as Moonies?
Sunlight contains these rays that begin with the letter 'u', most of which are filtered by the ozone layer?
questions.correct: Ultraviolet & Ultra-violet & Ultra violet & UV & uv rays & U-V Rays & uv-rays & Ultra violet rays & Ultra-violet rays
questions.explanation: Ultraviolet & Ultra-violet & Ultra violet & UV & uv rays & U-V Rays & uv-rays & Ultra violet rays & Ultra-violet rays.

questions.text: Name the longer of the two bones in the forearm that begins with the letter 'u'?
Name the male vocal and instrumental group that begins with the letter 'u' whose hits include; 'Vienna', 'All Stood Still' and 'Dancing With Tears In My Eyes'?
Name the British number one hit that begins with the letter 'u' by Billy Joel whose track was dedicated to his then girlfriend, supermodel Christine Brinkley?
Name the multi-talented British actor that begins with the letter 'u' who starred in 'Death on the Nile' as Hercule Poirot and whose 1978 autobiography is titled 'Dear Me'. Sir Peter _______?
In Greek Mythology, name the original 'God of the Sky' that begins with the letter 'u' and the father of the Titans?
Name the fifth and lowest class of the Indian caste system that begins with the letter 'u'. (English)
Another name for Odysseus that begins with the letter 'u', a Greek hero who devised the stratagem of the 'Wooden Trojan Horse' in order to enter Troy?
Name the river that begins with the letter 'u' in south-east South America, rising in Brazil and emptying into the Rio de la Plata?
At birth, this cord that begins with the letter 'u' is cut from the placenta, leaving a scar on the baby's abdomen known as the navel?
Song title that begins with the letter 'u' by Jimmy Young, Leo Sayer, Liberace and The Righteous Brothers to name a few?

Which British actress and singer that begins with the letter 'u' who moved to America in the mid-1980s whose television series include: 'Three of a Kind', 'A Kick up the Eighties' and 'Girls on Top'. Tracey ________?
Which soapy Edwardian period drama that begins with the letter 'u' traces the fortunes of the Bellamy family especially those who served them 'below stairs' at 165 Eaton Place, London?
Name the industrial city in Germany that begins with the letter 'u' which has a Gothic minster with the tallest spire in the world (528 feet)?
Name the northern constellation that begins with the letter 'u' which contains the seven stars known as 'The Plough' or 'Big Dipper'?
questions.correct: Ursa Major & big bear & great bear
questions.explanation: Ursa Major & big bear & great bear.

questions.text: Name the small guitar that begins with the letter 'u', which was developed in Hawaii from a Portuguese guitar?
Name the chief public art gallery that begins with the letter 'u' in Florence, Italy?
Name the Danish architect that begins with the letter 'u' of the much admired Sydney Opera House. Jorn ________?
questions.correct: Utzon & Utson & Jorn Utzon & Jorn Utson
questions.explanation: Utzon & Utson & Jorn Utzon & Jorn Utson.

questions.text: Name the British leading actress of stage and screen that begins with the letter 'u' who was married to dramatist John Osborne and later to actor Robert Shaw. Mary _______?
